(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN As)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP know))
      (, ,))))


mark(know-3, As-1)
nsubj(know-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, know-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (JJ many))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS readers)))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP who))
        (S
          (VP (VBP have)
            (VP (VBN ordered)
              (NP (PRP$ their) (NNP T) (NNS Shirts)))))))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB be)
        (VP (VBG dropping)
          (PP (IN by)
            (NP (DT this) (NNP Saturday)))
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP
                (VP (VB collect)
                  (NP (PRP them)))
                (CC and)
                (VP (VB have)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT a) (NN cup))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NNP Kopi)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(dropping-13, many-1)
prep(many-1, of-2)
poss(readers-4, our-3)
pobj(of-2, readers-4)
nsubj(ordered-7, who-5)
aux(ordered-7, have-6)
rcmod(many-1, ordered-7)
poss(Shirts-10, their-8)
nn(Shirts-10, T-9)
dobj(ordered-7, Shirts-10)
aux(dropping-13, will-11)
aux(dropping-13, be-12)
root(ROOT-0, dropping-13)
prep(dropping-13, by-14)
det(Saturday-16, this-15)
pobj(by-14, Saturday-16)
aux(collect-18, to-17)
xcomp(dropping-13, collect-18)
dobj(collect-18, them-19)
cc(collect-18, and-20)
conj(collect-18, have-21)
det(cup-23, a-22)
dobj(have-21, cup-23)
prep(cup-23, of-24)
pobj(of-24, Kopi-25)


(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD would)
      (ADVP (RB also))
      (VP (VB like)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB extend)
              (NP (DT the) (NN invitation))
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (NN everyone) (RB else)))
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB come)
                    (VP (VB join)
                      (NP (PRP us))
                      (PP (IN at)
                        (NP (DT this) (JJ informal) (NN Tea))))))))))))
    (. .)))


cc(like-5, But-1)
nsubj(like-5, I-2)
aux(like-5, would-3)
advmod(like-5, also-4)
root(ROOT-0, like-5)
aux(extend-7, to-6)
xcomp(like-5, extend-7)
det(invitation-9, the-8)
dobj(extend-7, invitation-9)
prep(extend-7, to-10)
pobj(to-10, everyone-11)
advmod(everyone-11, else-12)
aux(come-14, to-13)
xcomp(extend-7, come-14)
xcomp(come-14, join-15)
dobj(join-15, us-16)
prep(join-15, at-17)
det(Tea-20, this-18)
amod(Tea-20, informal-19)
pobj(at-17, Tea-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Liverpool))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (ADVP (RB very) (RB generously))
      (VP (VBD volunteered)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB donate)
              (NP (DT the) (NNS proceeds))
              (PP (IN from)
                (NP (DT the) (JJ entire) (NN afternoon)))
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (NN charity))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(volunteered-5, Liverpool-1)
aux(volunteered-5, has-2)
advmod(generously-4, very-3)
advmod(volunteered-5, generously-4)
root(ROOT-0, volunteered-5)
aux(donate-7, to-6)
xcomp(volunteered-5, donate-7)
det(proceeds-9, the-8)
dobj(donate-7, proceeds-9)
prep(donate-7, from-10)
det(afternoon-13, the-11)
amod(afternoon-13, entire-12)
pobj(from-10, afternoon-13)
prep(donate-7, to-14)
pobj(to-14, charity-15)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN so)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (MD can)
        (VP
          (VP (VB get)
            (ADJP (VBN involved)
              (PP (IN by)
                (S
                  (VP (VBG coming)
                    (PRT (RP down))
                    (PP (TO to)))))))
          (CC and)
          (VP (VB have)
            (NP
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NN cup))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNP Kopi))))
              (CC and)
              (NP
                (NP (NNP tryLiverpool) (POS 's))
                (JJ new) (NN item))))))
      (, ,))))


mark(involved-5, so-1)
nsubjpass(involved-5, you-2)
aux(involved-5, can-3)
auxpass(involved-5, get-4)
root(ROOT-0, involved-5)
prep(involved-5, by-6)
pcomp(by-6, coming-7)
prt(coming-7, down-8)
prep(coming-7, to-9)
cc(involved-5, and-10)
conj(involved-5, have-11)
det(cup-13, a-12)
dobj(have-11, cup-13)
prep(cup-13, of-14)
pobj(of-14, Kopi-15)
cc(cup-13, and-16)
poss(item-20, tryLiverpool-17)
possessive(tryLiverpool-17, 's-18)
amod(item-20, new-19)
conj(cup-13, item-20)

    (PP (IN Sugar))
    (, ,)))

  (NP (NNP Butter) (NNP Brioche) (. !)))

  (NP (NNP Venue) (: :)))

(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Good) (NNP Morning) (NNP Nanyang) (NNP Cafe) (NNP ,108) (NNP Robinson) (NNP Road) (NNP Date) (: :)))

  (NP
    (NP (NNP Saturday) (CD 9) (NNP October) (NNP 2010) (NNP Time))
    (: :)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNS 2pm))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP 4pm) (NNP Park))
          (PP (IN at)
            (NP (NNP Robinson) (NNP Centre))))))
    (VP (VBP opp)
      (NP (DT the) (NN cafe)))
    (. .)))


nsubj(opp-8, 2pm-1)
prep(2pm-1, to-2)
nn(Park-4, 4pm-3)
pobj(to-2, Park-4)
prep(Park-4, at-5)
nn(Centre-7, Robinson-6)
pobj(at-5, Centre-7)
root(ROOT-0, opp-8)
det(cafe-10, the-9)
dobj(opp-8, cafe-10)


(ROOT
  (INTJ (UH $)))


root(ROOT-0, $-1)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (CD 2))
    (PP (IN per)
      (NP (NN entry)))
    (PP (IN after)
      (NP (CD 1pm)))))

pobj(per-2, entry-3)
prep(2-1, after-4)
pobj(after-4, 1pm-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT an) (JJ open) (NN house)))
    (, ,)))

det(house-5, an-3)
amod(house-5, open-4)
root(ROOT-0, house-5)


(ROOT
  (S

    (VP (VBD required))
    (, ,)))

root(ROOT-0, required-4)

    (VP (VB drop)
      (PP (IN by)))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP look)
      (ADVP (RB forward))
      (PP (TO to)
        (S
          (VP (VBG seeing)
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (NP (EX there)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(look-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, look-2)
advmod(look-2, forward-3)
prep(look-2, to-4)
pcomp(to-4, seeing-5)
nsubj(there-7, you-6)
xcomp(seeing-5, there-7)
